tha-ap3:9.4: sobhayanti → sobhayantā (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | patāyanti sobhayantā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap3:26.3: Pammakā → pampakā (bj, csp1ed) | campakā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | sampakā (pts-vp-pli1ed) | cammakā (mr)
tha-ap3:28.2: camarā gaṇḍakā bahū → vakā bheraṇḍakā bahū (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | vakabheraṇḍakā bahū (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap3:28.3: sukapotā → suggapotā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | puggapotā (si) | suttapotā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap3:31.2: madhuke → madhukā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, csp1ed) | madhuke (pts-vp-pli1ed), kāsumāriyo → kāsamāriyo (sya1ed, sya2ed) | sumāriyo (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap3:32.1: Kosambā → kosumbhā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed), saḷalā nimbā → salalā nīpā (bj) | salaḷā nīpā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | saḷalā nīpā (pts-vp-pli1ed) | panasā ambā (?)
tha-ap3:50.2: pubbavidehakaṃ → pubbavidehanaṃ (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
tha-ap3:87.2: pathavī cākhilājaṭaṃ → paṭhaviṃ cākhilaṃ jahe (bj) | paṭhaviñcākhilañjahe (sya1ed, sya2ed) | paṭhaviṃ cākhilañjahe (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap3:114.1: Pacchime bhavasampatte → pacchimabhave sampatte (bj) | pacchimebhave sampatte (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap3:135.1: Attakāramayaṃ etaṃ → atthakāmaṃ mamaṃ etaṃ (si) | atthakāmaṃ mamametaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | atthakāramayaṃ (mr)
tha-ap3:154.2: Paccabyatha → paccabyathā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | paccabyattha (^pi-tv-kd1#220 [Mahākhandhaka/ Sāriputtamoggallānapabbajjākathā], ^pi-tv-kd1#227 [Mahākhandhaka/ Sāriputtamoggallānapabbajjākathā])
tha-ap3:159.3: Dantova dantadamatho → dantova dantadamathe (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | dantovuttamadamathe (si) | dantoca uttamadamathe (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap3:160.3: adhigacchesi → adhigacchāhi (bj) | adhigacchasi (si) | adhigacchehi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | adhigatosi (?)
tha-ap3:187.3: Sabbā velaṃva phusanti → sabbāva velaṃ phusanti (bj) | sabbavelaṃ paphussanti (sya1ed, sya2ed) | sabbavelam paphusanti (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap3:201.3: Catuddisānuviloketvā → catuddisā viloketvā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | catuddisānuloketvā (mr)
tha-ap3:208.3: vicinantā → vicintentā (bj) | vicintenti (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | vicinantaṃ (mr)
tha-ap3:211.3: na sakkeyyuṃ → na kappeyyuṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | na pappeyyum (pts-vp-pli1ed) | na pappeyyuṃ (mr)
tha-ap3:216.4: jhāpayī mama → jhāpayiṃ ahaṃ (bj, mr) | jhāpayiṃ mama (si) | jhāpayiṃ mamaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | jhāpayī mamaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap3:225.1: Samāpattīnaṃ kusalo → samāpattinayakusalo (bj) | samāpattivinayakusalo (si, pts-vp-pli1ed) | samāpattimhi kusalo (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap3:226.1: Sāvakaguṇenapi phussena → sāvakaguṇenāpi phussena (bj) | sāvakaguṇenāpi phusena (si, pts-vp-pli1ed) | sāvakaguṇaphussena (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap3:226.2: parisuttamabhāravā → purisuttamagāravā (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | purisuttamabhāravā (mr)
tha-ap3:228.2: vasumatīpi → vasumatī (bj, mr) | vasu patīnaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
